Package info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.dao

Interface CustomerDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDaoImpl
    public interface CustomerDao
    Allows predictable access to persistent Customer data.

        java.util.List<Customer> getAll()
        Gets a java.util.List of all Customers.
        Returns:
        All Customers

      • getById

        Customer getById​(int id)
        Gets a specific Customer based on their unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique identifier for Customer
        Returns:
        Customer associated with identifier if any

      • getByNameLike

        java.util.List<Customer> getByNameLike​(java.lang.String name)
        Gets a java.util.List of all Customers with a first or last name like the name given. Ignores case when searching for like names.
        Parameters:
        name - Name to find Customers by
        Returns:
        Customers with a first or last name like the name given

      • create

        int create​(Customer customer)
        Creates a new Customer record.
        Parameters:
        customer - New Customer data to store
        Returns:
        1 or 0 to indicate number of records created

      • update

        int update​(Customer customer)
        Updates an existing Customer record.
        Parameters:
        customer - Updated Customer data to store
        Returns:
        1 or 0 to indicate number of records updated

      • delete

        int delete​(int id)
        Deletes an existing Customer record.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique identifier of Customer to delete
        Returns:
        1 or 0 to indicate number of records deleted
